Text: Or even better, get the real thing directly from the source at http://www.mame.net instead of this lame attempt to take the open source of MAME and make it closed. Look at the forums there for an in depth discussion about why MAME32k sucks.

MAME32 is OK, it is MAME32k that is a ripoff of the original MAME and MAME32 that is the problem.

If you like the command line, go for MAME, otherwise go for MAME32. If you are a person who believes free public software should be stolen and taken away from the public go for MAME32k and go fuck yourself.
